net.proteusframework.core.mail

Class UnparsedAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.mail.UnparsedAddress

  • public class UnparsedAddress
extends Object
    Recipient / Address container for un-parsed InternetAddresses.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
